turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good afternoon. Yes, I would like to order a drink for pickup, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Ralph Avenue location in the Georgetown Shopping Center in Brooklyn

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what may we prepare for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an Iced Caramel Brulee Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are my choices?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, coconut, skim, 2 percent, whole milk or soy milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would love some whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. Just the latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, then. Your drink is on order at the Ralph Avenue location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You'll be able to pick it up in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you again!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a lovely afternoon!
